During the day of August 2, 2024, the air defense of southern Ukraine shot down 5 reconnaissance drones, of which three were of the ZALA type and two were of the Supercam type. The occupiers also attacked Odesa with three ballistic missiles, probably Iskander-M, from the territory of the temporarily occupied Crimea.
